channel.title: Can't Start 508 Client
channel.description:
hi, i downloaded client 508 with the files and build and all that so i can use it with my server but when i click on run it starts the client except its blank and in the cmd it says
[code]Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2194 | java.lang.Runtime Exception[/code]
Anyone know how to fix?
heres a pic:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/9162/22413060pj8.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img440/22413060pj8.png/1/][IMG]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/22413060pj8.png/1/w750.png[/img][/URL]
EDIT: IT COULD BE BECAUSE I DIDNT SET UP MY JAVA CORRECTLY BUT IM NOT SURE. I SET IT UP THE WAY YOU SET IT UP FOR A REGULAR SERVER, ALTHOUGH PROBABLY DOESNT MAKE A DIFFERENCE
Thnks in advance ---Chris---

item.title: Can't Start 508 Client
item.dc:creator: @games4pros games4pros
item.description:
@games4pros wrote:

the server doesnt have anything to do with this. Im not sure what the problem is. i can run clients which arent 508 but i never ran a 508 before so im not sure what im doing wrong or what im doing at all for that matter. thnks to anyone that figures this out

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Start 508 Client

item.description:
@trytohaxme2 wrote:

Not really sure mate, you try running the server before the client?
